alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 10:09AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Alamosa, western Huerfano, south central Custer and southeastern Saguache Counties through 1045 AM MDT... At 1009 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Crestone Peak to near La Jara. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alamosa, San Luis Valley Airport, Crestone, Hooper, Alamosa East, Great Sand Dunes, Crestone Peak, San Luis Lake and Mosca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
